timeline.bodyText: Why do we give it as pathVerification.tests? Looks like the module structure is wrong. The path to test files seems to be outside-tests/src/pathVerification.tests but the correct path should be outside-tests/src/pathVerification/tests.

@azinneera The module structure is correct, I generated it. I have both source files and test files since this check is to see whether tests defined in source files are being executed.
I guess the module name is confusing, I will get rid of the ".tests" part.
